sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with dian kuang 癲狂 , peak-illness and madness. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry niu huang 牛黃：療小兒百病，諸癇熱，口不開，大人狂癲 , “It cures all types of diseases of children, all types of epilepsy with heat, and inability to open the mouth, and in adults madness and peak-illness ”. Kuang dian 狂顛 , madness and peak[-illness] [6]

Pathological Condition identical with dian kuang 癲狂 , peak-illness and madness. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry fu long gan 伏龍肝 quotes Zhi qi ji fang 治奇疾方 : 狂顛謬亂不識人，伏龍肝末，水服方寸匕，日 三服 , “In the case of madness and peak[-illness], when [patients] are confused and do not recognize others, ingest fu long gan powder, one square inch-sized spoon, with water three times a day”.
